para.text: The raster Symbol named "NOTHING" can be used in GOTO mappings of geometries that should not be drawn in a Goto request. The symbol has a completely transparent raster_image, but isn't drawn at all.
You can apply this to certain geometries that are present in the goto_request, but need not to be drawn. For example because a point geometry is enough, and you don't want a label to be drawn.
